item.title: Report X-2023070994
item.description:
Report X-2023070994

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-10T21:10:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-11
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: This package was found leaking in the vanlines. Spill totes, pads and bags were utilized to control the spill upon discovery. DescribePack: Upon further inspection, one of the jugs had a loose cap causing a portion of its contents to leak out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Spill totes, spill pads and hazmat bags were used.
